title: Contemporary Novotel Bangkok Oasis near IMPACT Arena with Indoor Pool & Two Restaurants
description:
Experience the allure of Novotel Bangkok IMPACT, a modern haven in the pulsating heart of Nonthaburi. This stylish sanctuary is perfectly positioned for those attending events at the neighbouring IMPACT Exhibition and Convention Centre or the IMPACT Arena. With the Skytrain nearby and downtown Bangkok a short drive away, the city's cultural treasures are within easy reach. 

Relax and unwind in the hotel's chic rooms, swim laps in the expansive indoor pool, pamper yourself at the spa, devour premium cuts of steak at 145Â°F Grill & Bar and polish off delectable Thai and Asian delicacies at The Square. Venture beyond the hotel to explore Bangkok's rich cultural heritage, shop away at the Chatuchak Weekend Market and taste your way through the city's epic culinary scene.
offer_address: 94 Popular Road, Banmai Subdistrict Pakkred District, Nonthaburi 11120, Thailand,
